source: Thousands in Central Park panic after barrier collapse

source: Anna Hazare has heavily criticized the Prime minister mentioning that BJP-led government has come to the power in the centre due to the Lokpal movement.
translation: Anna Hazare ପ୍ରଧାନମନ୍ତ୍ରୀ ଶ୍ରୀ ଅନ୍ତର୍ଜାତୀୟ ବିଶ୍ୱବିଦ୍ୟାଳୟ ସମ୍ମିଳନୀରେ ଅନ୍ତର୍ଜାତୀୟ ବିଶ୍ୱବିଦ୍ୟାଳୟ ସମ୍ମିଳନୀରେ
reference: અન્ના હજારેએ વડાપ્રધાન પર પ્રહાર કરતા કહ્યું કે ભાજપના નેતૃત્વવાળી સરકાર લોકપાલ આંદોલનના કારણે કેન્દ્રની સત્તામાં આવી છે.

source: Four years have passed but the government is avoiding electing Lokpal and Lokayukt for some reason or other.

source: He added that regarding the Lokpal election, he will go on hunger strike from 2nd October and he remains firm in his decision.

source: Anna Hazare wrote a letter to PM Modi on Thursday alleging that in four years the government has just given excuses and has not appointed the Lokpal.
translation: Anna Hazare ପ୍ରଧାନମନ୍ତ୍ରୀ ଶ୍ରୀ ନରେନ୍ଦ୍ର ମୋଦୀ ଆଜି ଅନ୍ତର୍ଜାତୀୟ ସମ୍ମିଳନୀ ଅବସରରେ ଆଜି ଅନ୍ତର୍ଜାତୀୟ ସମ୍ମିଳନୀ ଅବସରରେ

translation: We should not forget that in the 73rd session of the United Nations General Assembly (UNGA), Sushma Swaraj had condemned Pakistan on Saturday.

source: Not only that, she also referred to the 9/11 mastermind Osama-Bin-Laden and mastermind of Mumbai attacks Hafiz Saeed in her UN address.
translation:
Answer:
Elle a également mentionné le 9/11, le chef de l'État Osama Bin Laden et le chef de l'État Hafiz Saeed, dans son discours à l'ONU.

source: Sushma Swaraj mentioned that Pakistan is a neighbouring country that has mastered the art of spreading terrorism as well as refusing to take responsibility for their actions.
translation: Sushma Swaraj ha detto che la Pakistan è un paese vicino che ha imparato l'arte di spingere la terrafia e di non rispettare le loro azioni.

source: She said that Osama-Bin-Laden who was the mastermind behind the 9/11 attack was found here.
translation: She said that Osama-Bin-Laden, who was the mastermind behind the 9/11 attack, was found here.
reference: તેમણે કહ્યું કે અમેરિકા પર હુમલો કરનાર 9/11નો માસ્ટર માઈન્ડ ઓસામા બિન લાદેન અહીં જ મળી આવ્યો હતો.

source: He was killed but the one behind the 26/11 Mumbai attack; mastermind Hafiz Saeed is still alive in Pakistan.
translation: The 26/11 Mumbai attack mastermind Hafiz Saeed is still alive in Pakistan, a senior Pakistani intelligence official has said.

source: He is carrying out rallies, nominating candidates in the elections and threatening India.

source: New Delhi : A political game has begun on the killing of Apple's manager by a police constable in Gomti nagar, Lucknow, Uttar Pradesh's capital.
translation: Translate the following text from en to gu: New Delhi : A political game has begun on the killing of Apple's manager by a police constable in Gomti nagar, Lucknow, Uttar Pradesh's capital. The constable, who was on duty, shot the manager in the head when he was coming out of his office. The constable has been arrested. The police have not yet said what the constable was doing when he shot the manager. The manager was taken to a hospital, where he was declared brought dead. The police have not said what the constable had been drinking. The manager was a native of Bihar and had been working with Apple for two years. He had moved to Lucknow to work for the company. The police have not said why the constable shot the manager. The police have not said what the constable was doing when he shot the manager. source: NEW DELHI: The Aam Aadmi Party (AAP) has described the government's announcement to reduce the prices of petrol and diesel across the country as "fraud".
translation: Translate the following text from en to gu: NEW DELHI: The Aam Aadmi Party (AAP) has described the government's announcement to reduce the prices of petrol and diesel across the country as "fraud". The party's Delhi unit chief Arvind Kejriwal said the government's decision to reduce the prices of petrol and diesel by Rs 2.5 per litre was a "fraud" and "a lie". "The government's decision to reduce the prices of petrol and diesel by Rs 2.5 per litre is a fraud and a lie. The government has not reduced the prices of petrol and diesel. The government has increased the prices of petrol and diesel by Rs 2.5 per litre," Kejriwal said.
